title: my league dosent open
body:
so , i am facing this problem : when i start LeagueClient , the legue of legends logo appeares for like 1 second and then disapeares (srry for my ,,good'' english) if i start lol.launcher.admin / lol.launcher ,  the league of legends client appeares , i hit launch , and same issue : league of legends logo appeare for 1 second and , guess what ! PUF ! nothing happends ... any sollution ?
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:432}}

replies.body: The client not appearing can be caused by a security setting with your OS or antivirus that's blocking it from launching.  Running as admin is certainly a step, but serves as a temporary workaround and not guaranteed.  You'll want to go through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot this for a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.
